Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.spring

Class FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizerFactory

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.spring.FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizerFactory
public class FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizerFactory extends Object implements org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizerFactory
A factory for creating ContextCustomizer instances based on @FrameworkAdapter annotations.

This class scans the test class for any FrameworkAdapter annotations, collects their specified base packages, and constructs a FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer to add those packages to the Spring context scan. If no @FrameworkAdapter annotations are present, it returns null, indicating that no customization is needed.

This approach allows for flexible configuration of additional base packages without modifying the default Spring context setup.

  • Method Details

    • createContextCustomizer

      public org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizer createContextCustomizer(@NonNull Class<?> testClass, @Nullable List<org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfigurationAttributes> configAttributes)
      Creates a new ContextCustomizer if the test class contains one or more FrameworkAdapter annotations.

      Each adapter's base packages are gathered and combined, ensuring duplicates are removed before creating the resulting customizer.

      Specified by:
      createContextCustomizer in interface org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizerFactory
      Parameters:
      testClass - The test class to inspect for @FrameworkAdapter annotations.
      configAttributes - The context configuration attributes (not used in this implementation).
      Returns:
      A FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer if any @FrameworkAdapter annotations are found, otherwise null.
